author: DEberhardt
body:
In https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1888 we discussed a bleed-through effect for colours. I was instructed to post it here as it pertains to the PowerShell formatting system.

## Steps to reproduce

```
Get-PSReadLineOption | FL *
```

to rectify 
```
Get-PSReadLineOption
```

## Expected behavior

correct display of Colour Parameters as `Get-PSReadLineOption` does

## Actual behavior

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44290340/98841095-8ce09480-243f-11eb-806f-f57ed71b14f3.png)

Running `Get-PSReadLineOption` the error is resolved again:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44290340/98841113-910cb200-243f-11eb-919e-3ea46ce208c3.png)

title: Colour Coding breaks when piping Get-PSReadLineOption to "FL *"
